entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add new `ModelMetadata` constructor for EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #56867
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, https, json #56861
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56860
  • ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync manual trigger #56859
  • BadHttpRequestException even before reaching controller action #56857
  • VS-CODE HTTP launch configuration trusted certificate required #56853
  • When using AddJwtBearer it can not read .well-known/openid-configuration if it contains an object #56852
  • Assets not found when calling app outside it's directory. Error: `filename.br` could not be found. #56851
  • Checkbox not re-rendering correctly when value of last clicked checkbox is changed in code #56847
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] .NET 8 Blazor Web App(WebAssembly) get an error: "TypeError: ar.monoStringToStringUnsafe is not a function" when are running with .NET 9 #56846
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56845
  • Perf regression: json, json, mapaction #56844
  • Perf improvement: https, json_middleware #56843
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware, json_middleware #56842
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware, single_query #56841
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException #56839

Closed

  • Connection Close Behavior on HTTP1.0 Requests #56223
    9.0-preview7
  • Como Hackear o Instagram de Alguém 2024 #56865
  • Produces generic variants of `ProducesProblem` extension methods #56178
    9.0-preview7
  • MapAssets System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: (Parameter 'offset') Actual value was 0. #56371
    9.0-rc1
  • Expose additional info about properties and JSON types in OpenApiSchemaTransformerContext #56584
    9.0.0
  • [Blazor MAUI] Byte Array Interop Still Serializes `byte[]` as string? #56850
  • Uncaught Error: No interop methods are registered for renderer 1 #56813
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #56836
  • Output caching middleware : Is Etag only compared to server cached data? #55414

PullRequests

Created

  • Use minified .js files from submodule in source-build #56864
    area-blazor
  • Add an explanatory comment to DuplexPipe #56863
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add direct references to System.Text.Json in a few places #56866
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-preview7
  • Add generic variants of ProducesProblem and ProducesValidationProblem #56810
    area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview7
  • Apply schema transformers on properties and other subschemas #56709
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • [release/6.0] Prepend ? when dealing with runtime query string prefixes #56837
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56827
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • IBrowserFile FormDataConverter Mismatch between Name and FileName #56833
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks #56811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, area-perf
  • Port "Add direct references to S.T.J. in tools" to `main` #56704
    area-commandlinetools
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
